full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 743 Filed 08/10/22 Page 200 of 247 328 LBUCmax5 Jane - direct 1 Q. During the years that we've been talking about, did your mother know that you were spending time with Epstein and Maxwell? 2 A. Yes. 3 Q. Would you ever talk with her about that? 4 A. Not in detail, but, you know, my mom was so enamored with 5 the idea that these wealthy affluent people took an interest in 6 me. 7 MS. MENNINGER: Objection. Hearsay, your Honor. 8 We've strayed into hearsay. 9 THE COURT: Just one moment, please. Overruled with 10 respect to the answer that's been given, but is that the end of 11 the question line, Ms. Moe? 12 MS. MOE: Your Honor, this testimony is offered for 13 the effect on the listener. We ask that the witness be able to 14 explain what is going on during this time period and how that 15 affected her. 16 THE COURT: You may ask that question. 17 MS. MOE: Thank you, your Honor. 18 BY MS. MOE: 19 Q. During the time period that we've been talking about when 20 you were 14, 15, and 16, did your mother ever talk to you about 21 Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell? 22 A. The most that she would talk to me about was saying that I 23 need to be -- 24 SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00011972
